EmailTemplate.name: Report - voke Solution Snapshot - Tosca.Email Offer 1
EmailTemplate.subject: voke: Tricentis Tosca Testsuite Makes Test Automation Simple
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
voke Analyst Report on Tricentis Tosca Testsuite
Hi {{lead.first name}},
Software analyst firm voke has published a comprehensive study of Tricentis Tosca Testsuite as part of its prestigious Solution Snapshot™ series. According to the report, Tricentis has proven itself a “new breed of software vendor” that “understands the plight of the testing professional.”
Voke reports that “Tricentis Tosca Testsuite is a solution uniquely designed to put testing teams on the path to Extreme Automation and eliminate time-consuming manual tasks frequently associated with functional and regression testing.” Other key findings:
- Tosca Testsuite is a robust solution for software test management and automation. - Tosca Testsuite’s unparalleled ease of use puts test automation within reach of testers at all levels.
The Tricentis Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/Report-voke-solution-snapshot-tosca.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
